description: A charming cottage nestled near a peaceful creek, featuring traditional Rajasthani architecture with modern amenities, a private garden, and easy access to the Pink City's attractions.
A spacious sea-facing villa with stunning sunrise views, fully furnished interiors, a rooftop terrace, and close proximity to local markets and the Western Express Highway.
An affordable home surrounded by lush greenery in a quiet Bangalore suburb. Features 2 bedrooms, a cozy balcony, and is well-connected to IT parks and shopping centres.
A luxurious heritage property overlooking Lake Pichola, blending royal Mewar aesthetics with contemporary comforts. Includes a courtyard, ornate interiors, and dedicated parking.
A modern apartment with panoramic lake views, open-plan living, a well-equipped kitchen, and access to a clubhouse, gym, and swimming pool within the gated community.
A cozy mountain retreat with breathtaking Himalayan views, a wooden-deck balcony, fireplace, and pine-forest surroundings â€” perfect for those seeking peace and fresh mountain air.
A beachside paradise just minutes from the shore, featuring an open terrace, tropical garden, hammock lounge, and vibrant Goan-style interiors with all modern facilities.
A spacious bungalow with a beautiful private garden, 3 bedrooms, a sunlit veranda, and located in one of Chandigarh's well-planned sectors close to parks and markets.
A stunning Blue City haveli with intricate stone carvings, a grand courtyard, rooftop dining area with fort views, and interiors that celebrate Rajasthan's rich cultural heritage.
A serene riverside cottage along the Ganges, ideal for yoga and nature lovers. Features a sit-out porch, minimalist interiors, and the soothing sound of the river all day long.
